title:
Why do they raise the manhole covers after the roads are repaved, instead of raising them before the repaving is done?  This causes the roads to have bumps in them and causes for a rough ride on a brand new surface.

I have noticed this on Market Street and South College.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2014/09/raise-manhole-covers-roads-repaved-instead/
